summary: The Department of Labor’s Job Corps program helps low-income youth gain job skills at 118 centers across the country. The U.S. Department of Agriculture (USDA) Forest Service operates 24 of the centers. In May 2019, both agencies proposed to return operation of the USDA centers to Labor. title: Job Corps: DOL Should Provide Greater Transparency in Communicating Its Rationale for Closure Decisions
